text.section: KRS 454.260 to 454.270 may be cited as the Nonresident Boating Act.

In enacting KRS 454.260 to 454.270, it is the intention of the General Assembly to prevent a nonresident using the waters of the State of Kentucky and as a direct and proximate result of said use, causing any injury to any person or property and creating a situation where it is difficult or inconvenient to obtain service of process by virtue of any claim arising therefrom.

law.history: Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 183, secs. 1 and 2.
